formalText: She was pressuring him to pay her
a couple thousand dollars or something.
Their bother actually wants them to call this woman and tell her to back off.
They don't know their interaction with their mom or if their mom is being strong or unwavering or she comes off.
They have a plan in their head trying to get him Healthcare so he can if he needs prescription and they don't know he can get some, they are trying to help their brother.
They are worried about their brother and want him to move somewhere new for a fresh start.
There is conflict between their mom and them about what to do about the brother and where to send him.
They can't take this burden alone contacting all these people calling all these friends.
